apis.name: LoginTC
apis.description:
LoginTC provides a two-factor authentication system that can be used with networks, websites, and both mobile and online applications. The system uses LoginTC credentials on smartphones in combination with a traditional username and password for authentication. This means that a potential hacker would have to possess both a user's password and their smartphone in order to breach an account.

The LoginTC REST API allows users to perform common administrative tasks and to send and check authentication sessions with end-users.
